snippet: Bill de Blasio, the public advocate and a Democratic candidate for mayor, is running his first television advertisement; it features his son, Dante.
abstract: Bill de Blasio, the public advocate and a Democratic candidate for mayor, is running his first television advertisement; it features his son, Dante.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: Son Says de Blasio Will Be a Mayor for All
headline.print_headline: Son Says de Blasio Will Be a Mayor for All
